snippet: Suzuki is strong in emerging markets, but has long had weak sales in the United States, where it will now stop selling its automobiles, reports Hiroko Tabuchi for The New York Times. Read more »

headline.main: Suzuki, Maker of Small Cars, Failed to Make It Big in the U.S.
